name: When Will It Rain?
description:
It's my first bitsy game! I made this for Punkitt's bitsy jam on the theme of 'Rain', but I got a little too ambitious with it and then a magazine deadline happened and OOPS. Oh well! Here it is.

Thanks to Adam Le Doux for making bitsy, Punkitt for setting such a cool jam theme, mildmojo for the 'exit from dialog' hack, and to Tom for all the encouraging emails and playtesting. (Tom actually made the jam deadline, the showoff. You can play that extremely funny game here: https://thetomstrange.itch.io/its-raining-at-the-judgemental-zoo)
